titleInfo.title: A homolog of the Rhizobium meliloti nitrogen fixation gene fixN is involved in the production of a microaerobically induced oxidase activity in the phytopathogenic bacterium Agrobacterium tumefacience

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Schlüter, A., Rüberg, S., Krämer, M., Weidner, S., & Priefer, U. B. (1995). A homolog of the Rhizobium meliloti nitrogen fixation gene fixN is involved in the production of a microaerobically induced oxidase activity in the phytopathogenic bacterium Agrobacterium tumefacience. MOLECULAR & GENERAL GENETICS, 247(2), 206-215.
